text:
[Verse]
Feel the rhythm take control
Lightening strikes we lose it all
Splashing puddles step by step
Dancing in the rain we’re set

[Verse 2]
Every drop a beat so clear
Music flows we have no fear
Night is young the world’s our stage
Under clouds we disengage

[Chorus]
Dance with me in pouring rain
Echoes of a sweet refrain
Hearts collide with every fall
In the storm we gave it all

[Verse 3]
Lightning sparks we’re on fire
Every step takes us higher
Thunder roars but we don’t care
Freedom flying through the air

[Bridge]
Our worries washed away tonight
In this rain we feel so light
Holding hands we lead the way
In this storm we will stay

[Chorus]
Dance with me in pouring rain
Echoes of a sweet refrain
Hearts collide with every fall
In the storm we gave it all
title: Dancing in the Rain
